oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 49 lines per pages, in black.

With this is bound: Thabat al-Shaykh Taqī al-Dīn al-Ḥiṣnī (ff. 7v-10r) -- Ijāzat al-Shaykh al-Saʻdī min al-Shaykh Muḥammad al-Shūrī al-Miṣrī al-Azharī (ff. 10r-12v) -- Thabat al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Bāqī al-Ḥanbalī (ff. 13r-27r) -- Ijāzat al-Shaykh Ḥāmid al-ʻImādī (ff. 27v-28v).
MS Arab 119. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Muslim scholars
